net.morbz.osmonaut

Class EntityCache<T extends Entity>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.morbz.osmonaut.EntityCache<T>

  • public class EntityCache<T extends Entity>
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds the IDs for entities that are needed until provided with the full entity.
    Author:
    MorbZ

      • isNeeded

        public boolean isNeeded(java.lang.Long id)
        Parameters:
        id - The needed ID
        Returns:
        true if the entity with this ID is needed

      • addEntity

        public void addEntity(T entity)
        Adds a full entity. This will drop the needed ID.
        Parameters:
        entity - The full entity

      • getEntity

        public T getEntity(long id)
        Parameters:
        id - The entity ID
        Returns:
        The full entity with that ID or null if there is no full entity

      • needsEntities

        public boolean needsEntities()
        Returns:
        true if there is at least one needed entity
